name: Purranormal Quest
description:
Join the magical adventures of a wizard cat as you battle against strange and eerie paranormal enemies in this simple yet exciting 2D game. With your trusty wand and spells, you must face off against a host of supernatural foes, each with their own unique abilities and weaknesses. Navigate through mysterious landscapes filled with danger at every turn, collect powerful spells and upgrades, and unleash the full power of your magic to defeat your enemies. With charming pixel art graphics and intuitive gameplay mechanics, this game is perfect for players of all ages who love action-packed adventures and magical cats. Get ready to become the ultimate wizard cat champion!

  •  Check the development progress: https://trello.com/b/xCWlozSj/purranormal-quest
  • Check the game on Scratch:  https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/795974702/
